com.carrotsearch.hppc

Class FloatShortScatterMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.carrotsearch.hppc.FloatShortHashMap
      • com.carrotsearch.hppc.FloatShortScatterMap
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FloatShortAssociativeContainer, FloatShortMap, Preallocable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<FloatShortCursor>

    @Generated(date="2017-10-22T12:19:55+0200",
           value="KTypeVTypeScatterMap.java")
public class FloatShortScatterMap
extends FloatShortHashMap
    Same as FloatShortHashMap but does not implement per-instance key mixing strategy and uses a simpler (faster) bit distribution function.

    Note: read about important differences between hash and scatter sets.

    • Method Detail

      • hashKey

        protected int hashKey(float key)
        Description copied from class: FloatShortHashMap
        Returns a hash code for the given key.

        The default implementation mixes the hash of the key with FloatShortHashMap.keyMixer to differentiate hash order of keys between hash containers. Helps alleviate problems resulting from linear conflict resolution in open addressing.

        The output from this function should evenly distribute keys across the entire integer range.

        Overrides:
        hashKey in class FloatShortHashMap
